entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who shrieks in surprise. She is also the one who is terrified and tries to stop Harry from breaking a wizarding law.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who suggests running into Pettigrew's house. He is also the one who thinks he would go mad if he saw himself bursting into Hagrid's house.

entities.name: pettigrew
entities.description: Pettigrew is mentioned as the one that Harry and Hermione are trying to catch. He is also a key figure in breaking the wizarding law of changing time.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who warned about the consequences of breaking the wizarding law of changing time.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as the one whose house Harry and Hermione are trying to enter. He is also a key figure in being seen by themselves and Hagrid if they break the wizarding law.

relationships.description: Harry suggests running into Pettigrew's house to grab him.
Hermione mentions Dumbledore as the one who warned about the consequences of breaking the wizarding law of changing time.
